about.name: Malatya Travel Guide
about.title: Malatya, Turkey: Culture With the Nature
about.description: The travel starts here with all of Turkey waiting! Plan that adventure with the heart! Come here to find Malatya!
about.excerpt: The dream begins with each touch with a beautiful culture
about.content:
Malatya, located in Turkey, speaks to all that travel here and more! What makes it special is with its culture with nature to all explore. You're all able to see heart from all over with its UNESCO title. There will be all to touch and feel with a beautiful heart in each beat! So are you ready? The best and great adventures await!

## A Dream Trip That Is Booked!

To make that step and dream real is seeing the heart of all in Turkey! Here is the city that is what can start to shine!

## That Plan For A Touch!

With a two-day heart of all you will travel. With heart and adventure for all and be! Let's plan how great it all is!

### Where the Heart of People Speaks!

Make sure you first start is Arslantepe Açık Hava Müzesi, what a wonderful treasure and joy to connect all of UNESCO heritage and is why this town shines! Also you should touch on is Ulu Cami. A historic cultural treasure!

### Where Mother Earth Makes Life!

You must travel the way to Levent Vadisi! It connects nature with what a heart touches. It gives us so much to touch and feel to this land. The best to touch with something with an heart is the Kayısı Bahçesi, what a cultural place this is!

### What It Taste!

There's a unique experience that will make those taste buds love Turkey and Konya more! Start with that heart with Kayısılı Gerdan Aşı what traditional dish you can explore!

### Where Are The Goods!

Last but not least you have to make that stop with heart and peace that shows all the life, with Bakırcılar Çarşısı that shares what culture can be for all!

## So What The Start Shines With You!

What you seek is not what will define you, but make that beauty. Shine. With an open arm to create and share to all the dreams come to fly!
